column5: Headed to Lindsay late Saturday afternoon for a couple quick hours fish in the evening, as well as a friendly local derby/meet and greet on Sunday. We caught a pair of decent (19 1/2 and 18 inch) walters Saturday night in the short time we were out...        Both were released, one caught trolling the other in the shallow weeds.  Sunday was the derby, had a great time!  The weather stayed good until the end at 3 o'clock.  Met a great group of guys and gals.  Couldn't buy a walleye that day.  Juli was the bass fishing queen.  Didn't catch any really large fish, but, some decent ones and lots of numbers. The bbq afterwards was amazing, venison burgers to die for!!!!  Couple pics of Juli's bass      The storm we drove through on the way home was pretty intense, driving rain, some trees were down.  Didn't take any pics.  Heading for Restoule on Saturday.
looks like a great time out, good storm eh
WELL DONE!! SEE YOUR WIFE STILL OUT FISHES YOU LOL
Thanks, Lloyd...I think, LOL!!  She kicked my butt yesterday on the bass...that crazy electric blue Yum trailer was magic rigged on that spinner harness.
good stuff! I was hoping to go out to that but didnt think I'd be around. happy the rain held out for you
WELL DONE!! SEE YOUR WIFE STILL OUT FISHES YOU LOL  Nice pics Frank - you both did better than vince and me yesterday..

Thanks, love my Legend...still haven't mounted my seats I bought months ago...got some great advice from Drifter16 and Jimmer on possible ways to mount them.  Might just wait until fishing is over this year, LOL!!
Hey, congrats to you guys. What a great time for you and Juli! More wonderful memories to store in the vault.
